vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in MockAggregator.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (MockAggregator.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_roundId' of MockAggregator.getAnswer (MockAggregator.sol#58) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_roundId' of MockAggregator.getTimestamp (MockAggregator.sol#62) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_roundId' of MockAggregator.setLatestAnswerWithRound (MockAggregator.sol#40) is not in mixedCase

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))

vulnerability_findings.name: Integer Arithmetic Bugs (SWC 101)
vulnerability_findings.message:
The arithmetic operator can overflow.
It is possible to cause an integer overflow or underflow in the arithmetic operation. 
Classification: SWC-101
